(villaskulcs.txt)
(cmd line: -i villaskulcs_16.txt -t)

(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d2 h19


yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.20
safebottom0.20
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.020

fmax900
fmin700
fratio0.8

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.025 #furatok
c2 = 0.050 #letörések
c3 = 0.075
c4 = 0.500 #gyors
c5 = 0.150 #keret

l = 16

(nyílás)
x = div($l, 3.364)
y = div($l, 1.732)
l1 = sub($y,1)

b inline 0,0 size$l1,$l z$z1 c$c3 jg0.05 nl0,1,0,1

l2 = div($l, 2)
y2 = add($y, $x)

l8 = sub($l,1)
l9 = add(0,1)

y1 = sub($y,1)
y21 = sub($y2,1)

l $y21,$l2 $y1,$l9 z$z1 c$c3 g1,0.5,0.5
l $y21,$l2 $y1,$l8 z$z1 c$c3 g1,0.5,0.5

lx2 = div($x, .75)
l5 = add($l,$lx2)
l6 = sub(0,$lx2)
l15 = add($l5,1)
l16 = sub($l6,1)

lx3 = div($x, 7)

l3 = add($l,$lx3)
l4 = sub(0,$lx3)

l3 = add($l3,2)
l4 = sub($l4,2)

(fej külső körvonal ejeje)
y11 = add($y,2)
l $y11,$l16 0,$l4 z$z1 c$c3
l $y11,$l15 0,$l3 z$z1 c$c3

lx4 = div($x, 1.5)
a1 = add($l2,$lx4)
a2 = sub($l2,$lx4)
a1 = add($l2,$x)
a2 = sub($l2,$x)
a11 = add($a1,1)
a12 = sub($a2,1)

(fej külső körvonal hátulja)

y3 = sum($y2,$x,$x)

l $y11,$l16 $y3,$a12  z$z1 c$c3 g1,0.5,0.5
l $y11,$l15 $y3,$a11 z$z1 c$c3 g1,0.5,0.5

(nyél)

w = mul($l,2)
lx5 = sub($a1, $a2)

b outline $y3,$a2 size$w,$lx5 z$z1 c$c5 nl0,1,1,1 r$lx4 g2,0.5,0.5

(levág)
l 0,0 0,$l4 z$z1 c$c5 no_comp
l 0,$l 0,$l3 z$z1 c$c5 no_comp
